title: The Chronicles of Riddick - Escape from Butcher Bay - The Movie
description:
The Chronicles of Riddick - Escape from Butcher Bay - The Movie

Starring:

Vin Diesel
Cole Hauser
Ron Perlman
Kristin Lehman
Michael Rooker
Joakim de Almeida
Willis Burks II
John Di Maggio
Dwight Schultz
and Xzibit


From the included readme:


"This is a compilation/montage of all the cutscenes plus a few appropriate cutscene-like conversations with NPCs from the game "The Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay" (as found in the "Assault on Dark Athena" version of the game). It contains pretty much the whole story of the game, in movie format.


Why should you watch this? In a few words: It's like the Riddick prequel movie we never got and it's damn good."

Technical details:
------------------
Captured from the PC version, set to highest quality settings and a good measure of AA.
Encoded at 720p x264, 5.1 aac, 30fps.
